summary:
Stage 2 design document covering:
- Recursive depth-first folder traversal algorithm
- Session detection decision tree (MP4 presence = session)
- Complete session.meta.json schema with UUID, videos progress, marks, and timestamps
- UUID v4 ID strategy with assignment rules
- Metadata lifecycle diagram
- Progress calculation logic (completed parts / total parts)
- Video completion threshold (90%)
- TypeScript type definitions for FolderNode, Session, VideoItem
